subject: Dependencies between test-methods
msgSnippet: Hi... is it possible to mark a testmethod A to depend on (or to be executed after) a testmethod B? Probably by a specific annotation or something else? I d
messageBody:
Hi...

is it possible to mark a testmethod A to depend on (or to be executed after)
a testmethod B? Probably by a specific annotation or something else?

I'd want to use it in cases where I my class-under-test as a crucial but
complex method like the constructor. In this case, I would mark some of the
other test-methods to rely on the constructor-tests. If the
constructor-tests fail, the depending tests should be skipped, because a
failing of these tests has no significance and make it difficult to find the
real error.

Stefan
